events.body: ACK a0a9a11642752578fb1f5142c3fb26cb39d1548a. On Ubuntu (s390x), I was able to reproduce https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/30587. With this PR building `zeromq` succeeds.

ACK a0a9a11642752578fb1f5142c3fb26cb39d1548a

```

comments.body:
Where does this commit hash come from?

I can see https://github.com/zeromq/libzmq/commit/55bd6b3df06734730d3012c17bc26681e25b549d or https://github.com/zeromq/libzmq/commit/59c91227b46b60b7f965816544b25fe0a3cc8bbe.
